s2.title: PDF Documentation
s2.p: You can get the entire &XercesCName; documentation in PDF format, xerces-c.pdf (or in zipped format xerces-c.pdf.tar.gz), for printing and offline reference.
s2.note: A word of caution! The tools to create the PDF documentation are still experimental. So the resulting PDF document is not perfect. We would be glad to receive your comments on the &XercesCName; mailing list.
